adjustAdminAccess(address,bool).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.access: Whether the address has admin access or not.

adjustAllowedVoltageSpenders(address,boo.details: Only admins are authorized to call this function.

params.allowed: Whether the spender is allowed or not
params.allowedVoltageSpender: The address of the allowed voltage spender.

params.gameItemsContractAddress: The address of the game items contract.

spendVoltage(address,uint8).details: This function can be called by the user or an allowed voltage spender.

params.voltageSpent: The amount of voltage to spend.

transferOwnership(address).details: Only the owner address is authorized to call this function.

params.newOwnerAddress: The address of the new owner

useVoltageBattery().details: This function can be called by any user to use the voltage battery.

adjustAdminAccess(address,bool).notice: Adjusts admin access for a user.

adjustAllowedVoltageSpenders(address,boo.notice: Adjusts whether a given address is allowed to spend voltage

allowedVoltageSpenders(address).notice: Maps the address to the allowed voltage spenders.

constructor.notice: Sets the owner address and instantiates the Game Items contract.

isAdmin(address).notice: Mapping of address to admin status.

ownerVoltage(address).notice: Maps the address to the voltage.

ownerVoltageReplenishTime(address).notice: Maps the address to the voltage replenish time.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership from one address to another.

useVoltageBattery().notice: Uses a voltage battery to replenish voltage for a player in AI Arena.

documentation.text: @notice Event emitted when voltage amount is altered.
@notice The address that deploys the smart contract.
@notice Maps the address to the allowed voltage spenders.
@notice Maps the address to the voltage replenish time.
@notice Maps the address to the voltage.
@notice Mapping of address to admin status.

@notice Uses a voltage battery to replenish voltage for a player in AI Arena.
 @dev This function can be called by any user to use the voltage battery.
